AERIAL.name: FAA Part 107 (Weight)
AERIAL.regulation_text: Small unmanned aircraft must weigh less than 55 pounds (25 kg) on takeoff, including everything that is on board or otherwise attached to the aircraft.

AERIAL.name: FCC Regulations (Transmitter)
AERIAL.violation_msg: Unlicensed transmitters must be FCC Part 15 certified
AERIAL.regulation_text: Radio frequency devices must be certified to ensure they do not cause harmful interference to authorized radio services.

AERIAL.name: CE Marking (EMC)
AERIAL.violation_msg: Pending Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) testing for CE mark
AERIAL.regulation_text: Equipment must be designed and manufactured to ensure that the electromagnetic disturbance generated does not exceed the level above which radio and telecommunications equipment cannot operate.

TERRESTRIAL.name: SAE J706 (Stability)
TERRESTRIAL.violation_msg: Static stability factor too low for terrestrial operation
TERRESTRIAL.regulation_text: Standard for measuring and reporting the static stability of single-track vehicles.
